text: The diagrams below show trapezoid WXYZ “moved” by a reflection, translation, and rotation.

For each case:

What transformation was used to move trapezoid WXYZ to trapezoid W’X’Y’Z? Describe the details for each transformation including diagrams to support your answer.

  • For a reflection, give the reflection line.
  • For a translation, give the direction and distance of line of translation.
  • For a rotation, give the angle of rotation and center of the rotation.

How do the trapezoid and its image compare?
